item.description:
For members who haven't been to a Boston City Girls Meetup yet!

Meet us for a drink or two on Friday, May 8th at Clerys
I'm limiting the RSVPs to 10 people to keep the group small and give us a chance to talk. If there's a lot of interest, we can organize a second newcomers meetup in May.

Directions: MBTA Orange Line to Back Bay, parking on street
Clerys is just a few steps from the Back Bay T stop, right near Be-Good and Brownstone.
item.name: Friday Drinks - New Members Only Please!
